name: Memory Palace
description:
Just a simple room that lets you spawn inputFields. This is supposed to be usable as a memory aid. Keep in mind that the downloadable version will be prettier.

Right click to spawn a note.
Left click to select note and edit text.
To delete use E
To save use the in game button on the back wall under the second floor.
The save file should be in the directory you extracted it to, which also allows you to modify the contents. The game will autoload the save file so if its empty nothing will happen but if you saved since the last use it will show up.
If you want further information about the name etc:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Method_of_loci
